description: The common options that shared by all tasks
title: RackHD Task Common Options

_88Timeout.description: This property can be used to specify a maximum amount of time a task may be run, in milliseconds. By default, this value is 24 hours. a value of 0 or -1 means infinite timeout

$eref.description: This property can be used to specify a maximum amount of time a task may be run, in milliseconds. By default, this value is 24 hours. a value of 0 or -1 means infinite timeout
